text: John Patrick White (February 27, 1937 - September 3, 2017) was an American politician and military personnel. He was born in Syracuse, New York. He served as United States Deputy Secretary of Defense from June 22, 1995 through July 15, 1997. He was a First Lieutenant at the United States Marine Corps. White died at a retirement center in Great Falls, Virginia from complications of Parkinson's disease on September 3, 2017 at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Harvard Faculty Profile * Category:1937 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Virginia Category:Military people from New York (state) Category:Politicians from Syracuse, New York
title: John P. White
